Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://www.gnupg.org/ftp/gcrypt/npth/npth-1.6.tar.bz2
ğŸš echo 1393abd9adcf0762d34798dc34fdcf4d0d22a8410721e76f1e3afcd1daa4e2d1  npth-1.6.tar.bz2
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf npth-1.6.tar.bz2
ğŸš cd npth-1.6
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/npth-1.6
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
